brief.content-text: The diagram depicts multiple icons that represent common data network symbols. These include various types of computers (a PC and laptop icon are shown), servers, and IP phones. On LAN's, these devices are typically connected by LAN media. Wired and wireless media icons are shown. Also shown are some of the most common intermediate networking devices that are used to direct and manage messages across the network, as well as other common networking symbols. Generic symbols are shown for a LAN switch, firewall, router, wireless router, cloud, and a WAN serial link, represented by the lightning bolt-shaped line.
